content: --इच्छ, --इष्ट, --ईप्सित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} according to wish or desire, agreeably to one's desire, as much as desired, as desired or wished for. (--च्छं, --ष्टं, --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} according to wish or desire, at will or pleasure; <ls>R. 4. 51.</ls> {2} as much as may be wanted, to the heart's content; यथेष्टं बुभुजे मांसं; <ls>Ch. P. 3.</ls>
